biotools.summary: A suite of tools that enables integrative SNP analysis in next generation sequencing data with large cohorts. It not only calls SNP in a population with high sensitivity and accuracy, but also employs a novel imputation engine to achieve highly accurate genotype calls in an efficient way.

bioschemas.name: SNPTools
bioschemas.summary: A suite of tools that enables integrative SNP analysis in next generation sequencing data with large cohorts.
